East Gate.Body: This is East Gate, the main gate of RDFZ.

Yifu Building.Body: This is Yifu Building, where first and second year high school students study.

High school Building.Body: This is High school Building, where 3rd year middle school students and 3rd year high schools student prepare for their upcoming exams.

ICC.Body: This is ICC building, where international students study for college application.

Middle school Building.Body: This is Middle school Building, where first and second year middle school students study.

North Gate.Body: The North Gate, less popular but still has a lot of traffic. Thanks for visiting!
